source_objects.title: Public Relations
source_objects.description: Learn how Public Relations can help growth your business with these coures on PR, media management for start-ups to established companies.

items.title: The DIY PR & Publicity Bootcamp

visible_instructors.title: Haylie Marchant
visible_instructors.name: Haylie
visible_instructors.job_title: Award-winning PR consultant, coach and mentor

items.headline: Learn how to use the power of PR and media relations to grow your business.
objectives_summary: How to use PR and Publicity to build your profile and boost your business
How to generate FREE media exposure for your business or brand
How the media works and what makes news (the science of newsworthiness)

items.title: Facebook Community Manager Associate (600-101) Practice Test

visible_instructors.name: Community Leads

items.headline: The original practice test for the Facebook's Community Manager Associate (600-101) exam & certification
objectives_summary: The students will exercise and learn how to successfully pass the Community Manager Associate (600-101) exam and get certified.

items.title: Telling Stories Through A Holistic Public Relations Approach

visible_instructors.title: Kaylin R. Staten, APR
visible_instructors.name: Kaylin R.
visible_instructors.job_title: Professional Storyteller, Writer, Public Relations Pro

items.headline: Practical Applications to Craft Your Own Communications Narrative, Plan and Toolkit From An Accredited PR Professional
objectives_summary: To find your communications purpose, narrative and more
To learn RPIE by the end of the course so you can effectively Research, Plan, Implement and Evaluate your programs/campaigns.
To put together your own communications plan and toolkit

objectives_summary: How to find the right media contacts
How to pitch the media to get media hits
The media pitching process

items.title: Easy Web Form Panel to Manage All of Your Online Forms

visible_instructors.title: Michaele Kayes
visible_instructors.name: Michaele
visible_instructors.job_title: Video Editor, Web Developer, App Developer, Graphic Designer

items.headline: In 30 Minutes or Less - Learn to create web forms and a panel to manage all of your online form submissions
objectives_summary: Manage all of their online form submissions in one central location. Create auto replies for when users submit a form so they receive a well designed auto response to their inboxes. You will also be able to edit the form's CSS to create the design style you are looking for.

items.title: Public Relations for Small Businesses
items.headline: I will teach you the essential skills to apply Public Relations to your business.
objectives_summary: Public Relations for Small Businesses
How to get free press for your business

items.headline: Master the essence of communication to be a excellent storyteller and communicator
objectives_summary: Understand the definition of communications and methods of storytelling
How to convey right message in proper ways when communicating to certain audience
Use basic techniques and key principles to frame stories and apply them to different media platforms

items.title: Media Monitoring: Guide to Online Reputation Management
items.headline: Learn essential media monitoring and social listening skills for effective online reputation management
objectives_summary: Online reputation management
Media monitoring
Social listening

items.title: Startup Attention and PR 101
items.headline: How to Launch a Product - Learn Marketing and Public Relations skills to make an awesome product launch from Ben Parr!
objectives_summary: Provide you with the basic knowledge of how to effectively work with -- and not against -- the press.
Teach you how to grab a journalist (or an investor's) attention.
Teach you how to successfully launch your startup.

items.title: Businesses: How to Use Twitter for PR and Media Coverage

visible_instructors.title: Claire Gamble
visible_instructors.name: Claire
visible_instructors.job_title: PR, digital marketing and content marketing consultant

items.headline: Use social media to help your business' PR and marketing and achieve coverage in top tier media outlets (all for free!)
objectives_summary: Why Twitter is such a powerful social media tool for PR, media relations and marketing for businesses.
How to create your profile to attract the attention of journalists on Twitter.
How to monitor and use the hashtag #journorequest to achieve media coverage for you and your business in national newspapers, radio and TV.
